plain: Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is fiction, their favourite kind of plot is character-driven, their favourite setting is a mix of real and imaginary places, their favourite writing style is descriptive and flowing, their favourite length is around 300 pages, their favourite topic is relationships and personal growth, their favourite pacing is a balance of action and reflection, their favourite narrative structure is third-person omniscient, and their favourite themes are identity, love, and self-discovery.
